import React from "react"; import { Button, Modal, ModalBody, ListGroup, ListGroupItem, Input, FormGroup, Row, Col, Container } from "reactstrap"; import { getCategories, createExpertService} from "actions/serviceActions"; import { connect } from "react-redux"; class Services extends React.Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { modalCategory: false, dropdownOpen: false, setDropdownOpen: false, categories: [], service: { } }; } toggle = (prevState) => { this.setState({ setDropdownOpen: !prevState }); } componentDidMount() { this.props.getCategories(); } componentWillReceiveProps(nextProps) { this.setState({ categories: nextProps.service.categories }) }; toggleModalSearch = () => { this.setState({ modalCategory: !this.state.modalCategory }); }; createExpertService = () => { this.props.createExpertService(this.state.service); } render() { console.log('-----categories----------', this.state.categories) return ( <>
